mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_claim (customer_claim_code, category_code, employee_code, customer_claim_title, customer_claim_contents, customer_claim_date, customer_claim_file, ehead_employee_admin) VALUES (#{customerClaimCode}, #{claimCategoryCode}, #{employeeCode}, #{customerClaimTitle}, #{customerClaimContents}, now(), #{customerClaimFile}, #{headEmployeeAdmin})
